sentences.english: It's seems this part of the ancient text was indexical in nature!
sentences.chinese: 看仿佛这个段子的那古代的原文一次有了索引的种类。

sentences.english: Click to read the original, into the city of Kaifeng education system kindergarten micro website.
sentences.chinese: 点击阅读原文，进入开封市教育系统幼儿园微网站。

sentences.english: He has checked the copy against the original.
sentences.chinese: 他已把抄件与原文核对过了。

sentences.english: The zero just to see the most absolute way is to use the dialect of the original text translated.
sentences.chinese: 而零才看到最绝的做法就是将原文用方言翻译过来。

sentences.english: Read the original essay, then see what readers had to say.
sentences.chinese: 阅读原文，然后看看读者们都说了些什么。

sentences.english: Literal meaning between the versions could differ, this is to preserve the emotion carried.
sentences.chinese: 为保原文感情，中英译本之间字面可能有出入。

sentences.english: What else gets lost or warped?
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，翻译还丢失或改变了原文的其他东西吗？

sentences.english: Go your own way. Let others talk!
sentences.chinese: “走自己的路让别人说吧”英文原文怎么说？

sentences.english: Where is the kernel of the original file TURBOLINUX can download?
sentences.chinese: 哪里有TURBOLINUX的内核原文件可以下载？

sentences.english: The original first sentence points out that a positive development industry resources.
sentences.chinese: 原文第一句指出资源开发业有积极意义。

sentences.english: So here comes The Third Man.
sentences.chinese: 所以片名原文才取作，“第三人。

sentences.english: Copy the spirit of the original not do it verbatim.
sentences.chinese: 要学原文的神，切不可原封不动照搬。

sentences.english: In doing translation, one should not alter the meaning of the original to suit one's own taste.
sentences.chinese: 翻译时不应根据自己的好恶改变原文的意思。

sentences.english: Island universe: a galaxy other than the Milky Way.
sentences.chinese: 原文为岛宇宙，即河外星系。

sentences.english: Lefevere once said that translation is, of course, a rewriting of an original text.
sentences.chinese: 列弗维尔曾经说过翻译是对原文的重写。

sentences.english: The text was corrupted by careless copyists.
sentences.chinese: 原文因抄写者粗心而有讹误。

definition: marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
source (esp. of quotation or literary allusion)/origin/where sth comes from
context/the surrounding words/same as 上下文
to quote/to cite/to recommend/to appoint/(computing) reference
to pause at appropriate points in reading aloud unpunctuated writing/to punctuate
